Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: One of the most delicious pizzas in Amsterdam, so it can be crowded, but absolutely worth it. Super tasty dough and a lot of sauce and fillings, delicious wine. Lovely personnel!

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Fine pizza place, nothing high-brow, but just a simple menu, really friendly staff, decent wines (slightly more fancy glasses would suit the wine better) and excellent lasagna in tomato sauce. In the less crowded part of de Pijp, Amsterdam's great off-beat neighborhood. Just the way I like it.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Best pizza in town! Thin crust without being dry, flavoured and good quality toppings, it‚Äôs really a must-try!

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text:
Absolutely amazing and delicious !!
owner-managed, very nice atmosphere ‚Ä¶

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Very poor delivery, the toping was spilled in the box. The Formaggi pizza was toooo salty.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Very nice pizza place with good service. They have sufficient vegetarian options for people like me. The place around this pizza place is nice as well, and I really enjoyed walking around during the evening. ‚Ä¶

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text:
I really loved this pizzeria! The service extremely friendly :)
There are some nice seats outside as well as insides, you get a big bottle of water, some bread and tasty olive for free. Even though we didnt drink anything ‚Ä¶

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Very nice pizza restaurant in one of Amsterdams happening neighbourhoods. Have come here before and really enjoy the energy in the room. Small space with lots of bar seating. Also room for groups, but then you should book in advance. Amazing tasty pizza and quick service. You can't go wrong with De Pizzakamer.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Very nice small restaurant for pizza. We ordered three pizzas and lasagna Bolognese. The margarita was good but the star was the diavola pizza! Very tasty and spicy. The lasagna were just ok. For dessert we got a tiramisu and a conoli. Both were really good. We left very satisfied and would gladly visit again.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: It's a good pizza place. The more complex pizzas have a little bit too much topping, missed good tomato taste on the simple one. For the price it's decent.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Pizza pizza pizza. Some of the best I've had. If you can't get a table straight away you can sit at the bar until one is available. Great atmosphere, selection and attentive friendly staff. I want pizza here every day.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: These guys have nailed the fundamentaIs in the art of pizzatry. This pizza was so good that it felt like a sin. In fact I decided to slice the pizza in the shape of a pentagram and mumble 'Judas, Judas, Judas' softly between bites. ‚Ä¶

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: The pizza is really solid, however do not expect any fireworks. Staff is friendly and the food came in rather fast.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Delicious pizza! I had the margarita and added spicy salami and rocket. Really good quality and very friendly, attentive staff. Highly recommended!!  It gets super busy so either go a little early or call and try to book a table üòÉ

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Such an amazing place. The food is superb and the staff incredibly friendly! Fantastic place not only to dine, but also to come for a beer as the atmosphere is super cozy!

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Excellent pizza, great atmosphere and wonderful service.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Really enjoyed eating here on a business trip this summer. It was packed but still received good service and a fabulous pizza. ‚Ä¶

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Delicious pizza and the guys are super nice and friendly

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Delicious pizza and the best tiramisu in the world. Definitely worth to try.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Best place in amsterdam. The highlight of our short vacation.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Delicious pizza, lively atmosphere and not too crowded (during the week).

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Good pizza and the place had a very good vibe!

Review Text: We had our pizza's at De Pizzakamer for the second time. I like the taste, thickness, flavors. Delicious pizza üçï

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: 5 stars, the host was the nicest person ever, and the food was amazing!!!

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: This is the tastiest pizza I have ever had, period. Very very reasonable prices and the size of a pizza is great. Staff is nice and atmosphere is very energetic and lively- in a typical Pijp style. However, it is always very busy. You can book a table only for indoors and only during a specific time period.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Have been to De Pizzakamer many times and have never been disappointed. Pizza is fantastic with many choices and super tasty. The place is not so big so sometimes you will need to wait for a table. We got in at 6:30pm tonight and got a spot ‚Ä¶

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text:
perfect

Great service for a very fair price.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Very nice place with cool staff and not to forget, amazing quality pizza. That's something that's quite hard to find in Amsterdam. I would recommend to make a reservation as the place is quite popular. Finished eating? Either chill there with a drink or visit one of the amazing bars in the vicinity.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Pizza 9-15euro. Not awesome but good. Kind people with nice vibe.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: After witnessing how they wash - or shall I say not wash - the beverage glasses and let them stay with detergent, I don't know if I can drink here anymore nor eat. The pizza is really good for the crust but the pizza sauce is very acidic. ‚Ä¶

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: De Pizzakamer, is one of the best pizza restaurants in Amsterdam, if not the best. The pizzas are just how they are supposed to be with the wright base and super fresh ingredients. The staff is really friendly and they will never push to ‚Ä¶

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Excellent pizza! The one with asparagus and coppa - is something special.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: One of the best Pizza restaurants(pizzeria) in Amsterdam!! I was there with my girlfriend and we eat prosciutto, salami and more as starter. Then we ordered two pizzas directly to the Pizza makers Maurizio, Guido and Andrea! The pizzas were ‚Ä¶

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: I ordered pizzas to take away, it was quick and delicious. The team was really welcoming.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Their pizza is amazing but the wait is just horrible. We order takeouts and an hour later we go pick it up they say ‚Äúsorry there‚Äôs been a mistake‚Äù and they make us wait there and do it in front of us. It‚Äôs been 4 times already and this ‚Ä¶

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: One of the best pizzas I've ever had!!!  I ordered the pizza with farmer's cheese, mushrooms and ham, and when it first came out, I wasn't sure about it. However, one bite and I was hooked - I ate the whole thing because it was so good!  I wish I was still in Amsterdam so I could go back - yum!!!

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Pizza con salciccia e tartufo. Period. I don't think I have ever ordered anything else, because it is simply that good. They change chefs every now and then, so the quality can vary a bit. But it never disappointed me. Great admosphere, not ‚Ä¶

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Great pizza for a bit higher price but the quality of the food matches the price. Only serves pizza as main, also some starters. The beer selection could be better but I only rate the food. Place was really crowded and a bit chaotic. Took 45 minutes but it was worth the wait. Would be 5* without the huge delay. Recommended!

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Really good thin-crust wood over baked pizza. Great spot for dinner on a nice day when you can sit outside. They don't deliver but you can phone in an order and it will generally be ready in 20‚Äî35 minutes.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: If you like Pizza Roma style (thinner than Naples standard a little bit crustier) then this the place! The tiramis√π was really good as well. The place is really small so it get full really quickly

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: The pizza is good, not great. The restaurant has a nice atmosphere but the night we were there, the waiting time for a table, service and food was way too long. Splitting the cheque was possible, but the attitude of the waitress told me that she hated doing it.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: This was the 2nd best pizza I've had in my life!  The only 'better' was in Napoli.  The staff was friendly and attentive.  The atmosphere was great.  If you want to get away from a touristy atmosphere this is the place.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Don‚Äôt expect a smile except from the manager and be ready to ask everything: napkins, forks, knives, water... oh and also not really friendly neighbours at your table. Fortunately pizzas are really good and indeed the place is cosy.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: The pizza is delicious! The best i had in amsterdam so far, service cab be very slow though and i had to wait a lot to recieve the food, and to be able to order more drinks.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: My expierience: I have been at Pizzakamer many times. I am Italian and I liked it. Suddenly something is changed; I go for 4 pizza takeaway. It takes a while but is ok as its busy. Half way my waiting time an other guy comes and asks for 2 ‚Ä¶

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text:
Pizza nothing special. Fuoco vivo, La Perla or Pecorino are much better.
The real issue is the waiting time. You cannot make a reservation so you have to go there and ask for a table, the staff will always tell you with a smile "oh ‚Ä¶

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Pizzas are good, prices not too high, you can actually see the pizzaiolo prepare the pizzas and put them in the big oven, as the kitchen is completely open...Not my extra-favorite of all Amsterdam but still a great choice!

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: They make the pizzas in a real oven, the quality is awesome and the price fair. I was there twice and very happy with the food quality and the service. They are great people as well. What a shame there are no more space inside and sometimes you have to wait for a free place, but it's worth.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Best pizza place in town - and that says a lot!

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Wowwee, easily the best pizza in Amsterdam that I have tried so far, I can't see it getting better than this, especially for the reasonable price. Add the truffle oil whatever you choose, trust me!

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: The best italian pizza so far in AMS üòã Delicious sauce and Marguerita!!!

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Certainly top 5 pizza place in Amsterdam. Very tasty pizzas both traditional and specials of the restaurant. Very good for family dinners. Can be quite busy on Fridays

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text:
Lovely cosy pizza place. Super friendly staff and always busy, which is a good sign!
Highly recommended!

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: This pizza is incredible. Beyond any expectations. Wonderful service. We went across town to eat here and it was absolutely worth it.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Great Italian pizza, good drinks.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: Really good pizzas. A bit small the place, so it seems that you are eating with the people of other table. But completely worth it for the pizza

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: I went here on due to a recommendation. Pizza was above average. The pizza oven makes a big difference. The place was full and we had to wait a while. A little expensive. Maybe as a treat for take away.

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp

Name: de pizzakamer de pijp
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Very few restaurants in Amsterdam manage to really impress me with their pizzas, especially the fancy and pricey pizza tents for which you pay a bit more. At De Pizza room I am pleasantly surprised with the ‚Ä¶
